overview: The revealing, twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender! Their only sin is unconditional love! It's time for more older/younger lesbian relationships! Girlfriends Films runs the game when it comes to lesbian films and this latest installment of lesbian Seductions follows that great tradition of prime lesbian erotica! Featuring India Summer, Alice March, Emy Reyes, Laela Pryce, Mercedes Carrera, Misty Rain, Mia Malkova, and Tanya Tate.
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender!
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 50
